item.title: CVE-2024-30444|2024-03-29T16:59:08.088Z -- zionbuilder.io -- WordPress Page Builder – Zion Builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in zionbuilder.Io WordPress Page Builder – Zion Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WordPress Page Builder – Zion Builder: from n/a through 3.6.9.
